content: Credit Card General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 06 May 2019What happens to points when I cancel a credit card?I'm currently using a Citi Rewards card, but am thinking of cancelling it then applying for a Citi Premier Miles card instead. I am wondering what happens to the points I've accumulated upon cancellation, are the points stored on the card or on my Citi account?2 answersAnswerBump0

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 May 2019The points are stored in your card, so cancellation means good bye to the points. Suggest you redeem them before cancelling the card.Just a side note, Cit Rewards Card gives you ThankYou points while Citi Premier Miles gives you Citi Miles. Both are different, and they don't pool.0 comments0
